N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 192.4 - Apportionment of school funds

State Regulations

Apportionment of school funds shall be made in such a
manner that individual school districts will suffer no loss of public money on
account of the release of pupils as herein provided. A day's credit shall
accrue to a school district for each day that a pupil is released not to exceed
30 days in any one school year. Credit shall be granted for whole days of
absence only. School authorities shall record the absence of pupils in school
registers in accordance with instructions by the Commissioner of

Education. Notes
